Apple makes such a delicious pizza that it was called the best in the US
03 Nov 2019, 16:02 by Ilya Sidorov
Apple employees said that the company is preparing very tasty pizza. Some call it the best in the USA.
Apple takes pizza seriously. There was a wood stove in the old headquarters, and the designers came up with special packaging that retains heat better.
During a certain period, Apple employees ordered pizza so often that the company banned the sale of more than three pieces per person.
I swear this is the best pizza I've eaten in the United States. She is really good. Luca Todesco, developer


This pizza was sold at Apple in 2017.

Apple makes pizza according to a special recipe, so it turns out so delicious.
I love pizza, and I eat it in literally every city. I can say that it was a good pizza, the sauce was great, the cheese was perfectly melted. I'm a big fan of Apple, and it was a dream for me to try pizza at Apple headquarters. Ivan Rodriguez, developer
There are six pizzas to choose from at Apple Cafeteria. They cost $ 7-8, which is very cheap for the United States. Unlike Google and Facebook, Apple does not feed its employees for free.


Apple pizza prices in 2017.

Paid dinners have an interesting story related to Steve Jobs.
Scott Forstall, a former Apple vice president of iOS, said that during lunch with Steve, Jobs always paid for him. Forstall was embarrassed, so he asked Jobs not to do so. Steve's answer was unexpected:
Do you know that you pay for food by paying with your employee card, and then we deduct this money from your salary? I'm only paid one dollar a year! Every time I spend with my card, we get free food.
Trying Apple pizza isn't easy. You must either be an employee of the company or have a friend at Apple who can take you to the cafeteria. [Vice]
